content:
Does anyone have the year in which we moved from Skype to Zulip? I don't remember, but I need the date for an article I'm writing.
My guess would be 2016...?
Based on the graph, looks like Feb. 16, 2016 is when we opened Zulip up to the general community. Skype got shut down about 6 months later

https://chat.fhir.org/stats#
(link in top left under the gear icon)
